summary: Creates one place to buy everything that you need
descriptionHtml:
The Merchant\'s Guild is your one stop shop for all your shopping needs. Well respected merchants from all over Tamriel have come to the Guild to provide you with a shopping experience like no other.  Never again run from city to city buying different things. With the Merchant\'s Guild, you only have one place to go to for anything you want to buy. 
Inside there are full crafting and storage accessories, along with 13 stores that sell everything from spell tomes to armor to alchemy ingredients. The merchants inside the stores also have lots of gold to let you sell all your unwanted junk to them. 
Along with ten normal stores, there are three stores specialized to sell items based on your playing style. Go to the store Assassin’s Supplies if you like sticking to the shadows, or take your business to Warrior’s Supplies if you prefer charging into battle with a two handed weapon.
	Normal Stores
	-Nightshade’s Ingredients
	-The Ebony Arrow
	-The Steel Helmet
	-Sword Breaker’s Shields
	-The Blacksmith’s Hammer
	-The Black Soul Gem
	-Magicka’s Spell Tomes
	-Hammerfell Blades 
	-Red Mountain Poisons and Elixirs
	-Malacath’s Stronghold

Specialized Stores
-Warrior’s Supplies
-Assassin’s Supplies
-Mage’s Supplies

Inside the Tower
-21 empty nonrespawning chests
-Four empty safes
-Three strongboxes
-Full crafting accessories including alchemy and enchanting

Bugs
-Haven’t found any yet
-If you come across some, post a comment on it and I will fix it 

Future Additions
-Most likely a store for buying horses and dogs as companions
-Possibly billboards advertising stores

Bug Fixes
-Merchants will now give you money if you sell them items.
-With this update, merchants only have 10,000g instead of 65,000g.
-Warriors Supplies now has locks and ownership on all of its chests.
-NEW EXTERIOR!
author: grant343
